p: Figure 8a shows the milky white feed oil/water emulsion. The collected water and oil are shown in Figure 8c. The collected filtrate was transparent when compared with the feed emulsion. Figure 8b,d shows the optical microscopy images of feed and filtrate solutions. It can be observed from Figure 8 that the feed emulsion shows larger densely packed droplets and the droplet size is smaller for the filtrate solution, indicating the efficient separation performance for the PS/CNT membranes.
